lom:description.lom:string: The largest earth sciences library in the world. The available data sets are: National Geologic Map Database, U.S. Board on Geographic Names. USGS Earth Science Photographic Archive, USGS Search Assistance ? FAQ's bullet USGS Reports & maps (Publications Warehouse), USGS Library Selected Print Journal Holdings.

lom:title.lom:string: Library of the U.S. Geological Survey
